page.title: 03RECREATION IN DAGENHAM
page.content: To find out how people spend their{ {spare time}we went to the Heathway shops. We asked 128 people different questions. We found that football, snooker, and tennis were the favourite{T.V. sports. Most people enjoy playing football aswell as watching it. Most people read in their spare time, but{gardening}and T.V. were also common activities. We asked where they went on {holiday}last year. Most people stayed in Englnd. Second most popular holiday was Spain. 50 people did not go on holiday at all. Also 51 people out of the 128 rarely drink in pubs. The most popular T.V. programmes were 'Only Fools and Horses' and 'Eastenders'. Most people thuoght that this area needed more recreational ideas.
